metadata.synopsis: One-liner dialog for one of the idling Flaming Fist officers at the barracks near the Basilisk Gate.

0.speaker: Manip Seyama
0.text: Your tools were stolen, right? No - you were mugged! Wait, I'm mixing you up with another citizen. I'm terribly sorry, I'll - I'll get back to you.
0.context: NodeContext: frazzled, doing her best to keep everyone happy

1.speaker: Manip Seyama
1.text: I'm doing my utmost to get through these crime reports. I'll be with you as soon as I can!
1.context: NodeContext: frazzled, doing her best to keep everyone happy

2.speaker: Manip Seyama
2.text: Come back another day, citizen. Due to Lord Gortash's death, state security matters take precedence over routine crime reports. Now move along.
2.context: NodeContext: knows her commander is acting weird but has no idea why - trying to cover for her

3.speaker: Manip Seyama
3.text: Blaze Portyr is perfectly fine, she's simply, ah, under tremendous pressure. There's nothing to worry about.
3.context: NodeContext: knows her commander is acting weird but has no idea why - trying to cover for her

4.speaker: Manip Seyama
4.text: I'm afraid I have a dozen crime reports to organise - kindly wait outside.
4.context: NodeContext: frazzled, doing her best to keep everyone happy
